name: W3SCHOOLS - Graphite (by Jooch)
description:
I was frustrated that nobody was able to make a working dark theme for w3schools, so made one myself.
This theme focuses on: easing the eyes, better readability, functionality.
Editor works as it should!
additional_info:
White themes are one of the many health hazards (such as smoking) that we inherited from our not so health conscious parents. Educate others and protect them against degrading eyesight!

Please report any bugs you find
